Stephen Hawking
  • In response tae the pushionin o Sergei Skripal wi a nerve augent, the Unitit Kinrick expels 23 Roushie diplomats.
  • Breetish pheesicist an cosmologist Stephen Hawking (picturt) dees at the age o 76.
  • At least 49 fowk are killt efter US-Bangla Airlines Flight 211 crashes en route frae Dhaka, Bangladesh, tae Kathmandu, Nepal.
  • The Winter Paralympics appen in Pyeongchang, Sooth Korea.
  • The wrack o USS Lexington is diskivert in the Coral Sea.
  • Recent daiths
  • Mair current events...
